type.description:
## Change Resource

---



[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/change_resource)

Changes the value of a power that either uses the [Resource](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/change_resource) power type, or has a built-in cooldown.

Type ID: `origins:change_resource`




---

### Examples

```json
"entity_action": {
    "type": "origins:change_resource",
    "resource": "namespace:example",
    "change": 1
}
```

This example will add 1 to the `namespace:example` (`data/namespace/powers/example.json`) power that uses the [Resource (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/change_resource).
